info.name: Twitter Modal Full Width
info.description: Enlarge the max-width of the modal in twitter. Also expand images to full width.
info.additionalInfo:
Install this script if you want to see original image:
https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/25348-twitter-original-image

Changelog
---------
* 2017.6.19
	Fix: style with single photo.
	Fix: 1px gap between images.
* 2016.12.14
	Fix: Add max-width: 100% to image.
* 2016.12.6
    Expand image in reply thread.
    Support videos. Fix video disappeared bug.
